subject: BCS National Championship
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The Irish defense, a unit that Manti Te’o had personified and which had defined Notre Dame’s undefeated regular season, allowed 529 yards in a loss to Alabama in the B.C.S. national championship game.
snippet: The Irish defense, a unit that Manti Te’o had personified and which had defined Notre Dame’s undefeated regular season, allowed 529 yards in a loss to Alabama in the B.C.S. national championship game.
